CustomField.description: Grace Period can be defined in days. E.g. If Grace Period is defined as 7 days then the system will wait for 7 days before it starts accruing any Overdue Interest . On the 8th day if the amount is not paid then the system will accrue overdue interest for 8 days and continue accruing the overdue interest.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: It allows you to provide the client with additional days after the due date for loan repayment. For example, if the Grace period is defined as 7 days, then the system will wait for 7 days before it starts accruing any Overdue Interest .
CustomField.label: Grace Period Duration
